title: Una Healy cosies up to boyfriend David Breen while celebrating her birthday
text:
Her ex-husband Ben Foden recently made his debut on The X Factor: Celebrity with fellow rugby stars Thom Evans and Levi Davis.

And Una Healy looked more loved-up than ever as she recently celebrated her 38th birthday with her boyfriend David Breen.

The couple looked cosy as Una sat on David's lap in a restaurant as they enjoyed dinner where Una was presented with a birthday cake in the shape of a Double Decker chocolate bar.

Una Healy looked more loved-up than ever as she recently celebrated her 38th birthday with her boyfriend David Breen, 34

The singer looked stunning for the dinner date where she donned a bright blue long-sleeved mini-dress while Irish sports star David, 34, looked dapper in a grey jumper and blue jeans.

Alongside the snap, Una wrote: '10/10 Birthday meal with @breenors' with some of her celebrity pals including Nadine Coyle and former Saturdays bandmate Rochelle Humes sending their well wishes.

The hitmaker continued her birthday celebrations with another dinner over the weekend where she enjoyed an evening at Italian restaurant Sette in London.

Una publicly revealed that she and Irish hurler David were offically a couple last Christmas.

Performance: It comes as Una's ex-husband Ben Foden recently made his debut on The X Factor: Celebrity with fellow rugby stars Thom Evans and Levi Davis

She posted on Instagram that she would be seeing out 2018 on a positive note following her painful split with her Northampton Saints and England rugby international star ex.

In the photo, in which Una stood alongside David, who captains the Limerick senior team, the pair cuddled up next to an enormous Christmas tree.

Una's ex Ben is currently taking part in The X Factor: Celebrity as one third of the group Tristar with fellow rugby players Thom Evans and Levi Davis.

The trio made a good impression on the first episode on Saturday where they received high praise from the judges for their audition where they sang No Diggity.

Festivities: The hitmaker continued her birthday celebrations with another dinner over the weekend where she enjoyed an evening at Italian restaurant Sette in London

It comes after Ben begged for Una's forgiveness after making 'the biggest mistake' by cheating on her.

Speaking to The Sun, the rugby player, 34, admitted that he hoped the pop star would forgive him for his infidelity during their marriage.

He said candidly: 'I hope Una will forgive me. I made the biggest mistake and the most ­stupid mistake you can make in a relationship.

'We seemed like a perfect match but people never know what happens behind closed doors. I think it’s safe to say that Una and I were struggling for a number of years.'

Ben added that cheating on her was 'the final nail in the coffin' of their marriage.

Since Una and Ben split, he has got married to American socialite Jackie Belanoff Smith

Una and Ben married in Ireland in 2012 after four years of dating. They welcomed daughter Aoife shortly before they got married, and son Tadhg in 2015.

Ben's tattered reputation suffered a further blow in 2018 after he used dating app Bumble to publicly announce his separation from the former The Saturdays star.

The couple confirmed their separation after six years of marriage in July 2018, following his alleged affair with PR girl Becky Milne.

Ben hit the headlines in August when he tied the knot with Jackie Belanoff Smith just two weeks after they first began dating.
description: The couple looked cosy as Una sat on David's lap in a restaurant as they enjoyed dinner where Una was presented with a birthday cake in the shape of a Double Decker chocolate bar.
